description:
Ellis is a student at a local university. He had come in a few months ago with a friend who was inquiring about modeling. I immediately noticed that Ellis was much better looking than his friend... blonde hair, piercing blue eyes, and a tight muscular body. His friend decided he wasn't interested, but fortunately Ellis was — in fact, he was very excited about the idea of making money for school. The only problem was that he was leaving early the next morning for the summer and I couldn't film him that day because he'd been fucking his girlfriend all morning. So, I gave him my number and told him to call me when he got back, half expecting that I'd never hear from him again.

Fast forward two months and Ellis is back, wanting to do some work before school starts. His look had changed (he's a natural brunette), but he still had a really hot body and a nice, big dick.

As he warned me beforehand, Ellis is kind of a chatterbox when he's nervous. But he's very friendly and pretty funny actually...
title: Ellis
